name: Lorazepam (Ativan)
summary: A short- to intermediate-acting benzodiazepine used for anxiety disorders, insomnia, status epilepticus, and acute agitation.
description: Lorazepam is a benzodiazepine with anxiolytic, sedative, muscle relaxant, and anticonvulsant properties. It is commonly used in the treatment of anxiety disorders, acute agitation, insomnia, and status epilepticus. Lorazepam is notable for its intermediate half-life and lack of active metabolites, making it useful in patients with hepatic impairment.

sections.text: Enhances the activity of GABA at the GABA-A receptor, increasing chloride influx and neuronal hyperpolarization, leading to CNS depression.

adult.anxiety: 2–3 mg/day in divided doses; maximum 10 mg/day
adult.status_epilepticus: 4 mg IV given slowly; may repeat in 10–15 minutes if necessary (maximum 8 mg in 12 hours)

sections.geriatric: Start with 1–2 mg/day in divided doses
sections.hepatic_impairment: No active metabolites; relatively safer, but use lowest effective dose
sections.renal_impairment: Use with caution in severe impairment

sections.text: Onset: Oral 20–60 minutes, IV 1–3 minutes; Duration: 6–8 hours for oral, shorter for IV in acute seizure control.

sections.black_box: Concomitant use of benzodiazepines and opioids may result in profound sedation, respiratory depression, coma, and death.
other: Risk of misuse, abuse, and addiction
Avoid abrupt discontinuation due to withdrawal risk
May impair motor skills and judgment

sections.pregnancy: Avoid unless benefits outweigh risks; risk of fetal harm and neonatal withdrawal
sections.lactation: Excreted in breast milk; may cause sedation in infants
sections.pediatrics: Use with caution; dose adjustments required
sections.geriatrics: Increased sensitivity to sedatives; start with lowest dose

sections.text: Reduce dose gradually over weeks to prevent withdrawal symptoms such as anxiety, insomnia, tremors, or seizures.

items: Intermediate duration makes it useful for both acute and maintenance therapy in certain conditions
Preferred in hepatic impairment due to lack of active metabolites
High risk of dependence with prolonged use

seo.description: Lorazepam is a benzodiazepine used for anxiety, insomnia, and seizures. Learn about its dosing, effects, interactions, and precautions.
